name: Fantnasy Gaem
description:
Made for the "So Bad it's Good Jam" so it is bad on purpose. Totally not based on Dark Souls (c) FROM software

  • Atrocious Mapping
  • Bad Eventing
  • Mostly Default Assets, and what Custom Assets exist have barely any work put in
  • a

I had a lot of fun making this, so I hope it's at least a bit fun to play! It's a nice change of pace to make something without trying to make it good :D

This game page may or may not be deleted later (probably not)
